name: Jeremiah Grossman
background: Web application security pioneer. Founder of WhiteHat Security. Discovered numerous browser vulnerabilities. Author on web security. Black Hat speaker.

principles.name: The browser is the new operating system
principles.description: Most attacks now target web applications and browsers. The OS is increasingly secure; the browser is the new attack surface. Secure the browser, secure the user.
principles.falsification: When native applications become primary attack vectors again

principles.name: You can't secure what you don't know you have
principles.description: Shadow IT, forgotten APIs, legacy systemsâ€”you can't protect unknown assets. Asset inventory is the foundation of security. Discovery before defense.
principles.falsification: When automated discovery tools achieve complete coverage

principles.name: Measure security like you measure business
principles.description: Security without metrics is opinion. Track vulnerability density, time-to-fix, risk exposure. What gets measured gets managed.
principles.falsification: When metrics create perverse incentives that reduce actual security
